transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Namaste sir, main baat kar raha hun, good morning.
Customer: Haan ji, good morning sir.
Executive: Kaise hain aap?
Customer: Achha hun sir.
Executive: Ji sir, main keh raha hun ki aapko do leads bheji thi consume kiye aapne?
Customer: Haan consume kiye hai lekin usme se ek ne to bola Bihar ki hai ek to.
Executive: Usne bola Bihar ki hai, Bihar ki Patna.
Customer: Haan to Bihar mein bhi to deal karte hain aap.
Customer: Karte hain lekin unse maine baat bhi ki hai, maine call lagaya unko, haan to wo kisi madarse ke sanchalak hain.
Customer: To unhone kaha hai ki humne to search kiya hai aur hume jo hai marble pathar chahiye, unko ceramic ka chahiye.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Unhone kaha ki hamara ceramic ka koi product nahi hai.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Aur dusra wala bahar ka jo hai switchon ka aa raha hai.
Executive: Number bhej doon aapko dono ke?
Executive: Nahi nahi sir aapne baat kar li to yahi bahut hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai baki aap thik se manage kijiye na aap, ek buyer bola hai.
Executive: Befikar rahiye, befikar rahiye, ek buyer ko aaya do minute pehle mere paas mein.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: To unhone detail mangi hai, abhi main kar raha hun unse baat, abhi kya hota hai.
Executive: Haan to befikar rahiye, hum khud hi aapko kal se lead bhi share kar rahe hain.
Customer: Bilkul, nahi aap to account, account bas jo apne product hai uske related chalne do, koi issue aayega hi nahi, kaise aayega.
Executive: Ji hum us, hum usi pe hi working kar rahe hain sir.
Customer: Haan bilkul sir.
Executive: Befikar rahiye ki hum khud ispe hain.
Customer: Baki jaisa bhi hota hai aap mujhe bataiyega, baki sir aapka ye jo concern open hai ise main close kar doon?
Customer: Kaun sa?
Executive: Aapne 96 pe call kiya tha, aapke paas mera number to hai hi hai, aap mujhe call kar lijiyega agar koi issue aata hai.
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai sir.
Executive: Ek feedback aayega mera to aap de dijiyega please.
Customer: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received irrelevant buyleads (Bihar, switches).



Resolution:

- Executive assured leads would be product-related.
- Executive offered to close the open concern.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to provide feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, account management, feedback
